casebody.data:
James A. SMAIL, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
MERCEDES-BENZ USA, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. James A. Smail, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Mercedes-Benz USA, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158321
COA: 337709
SC: 158322
COA: 338326 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 24, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
